articles.title: Lucy the elephant given clean bill of health: Edmonton Valley Zoo
articles.description: The Edmonton Valley Zoo says their elephant, Lucy, has been given a clean bill of health. The zoo made the announcement on Thursday on Facebook, saying independent elephant experts Dr. Jennifer D’Agostino and Mr. Michael McClure came to Edmonton to assess Lucy. articles.description: The US, which recently captured its President Nicolás Maduro, has long demanded the detainees be freed.

articles.title: Trump says meeting Iran’s ‘Crown Prince’ Pahlavi would not be appropriate
articles.description: US president signals he is not ready to back the Israel-aligned opposition figure to lead Iran in case of regime change.

articles.title: Bouchard completes Oilers rally over lowly Jets; Winnipeg’s winless skid goes to 11
articles.description: Evan Bouchard scored a goal and added an assist to lead the Edmonton Oilers to a come-from-behind 4-3 victory over the Winnipeg Jets on Thursday. articles.title: Victoria Faces ‘Dangerous’ Fire Day as Heatwave Bakes Australia
articles.description: Authorities have issued several evacuation orders in Australia’s Victoria state as wildfires burn out of control, with parts of the country’s heavily populated east coast sweltering under a heatwave.

articles.description: Evan Bouchard scored a goal and added an assist to lead the Edmonton Oilers to a come-from-behind 4-3 victory over the Winnipeg Jets on Thursday.

articles.title: Winnipeg Jets reach new low, falling 4-3 to Edmonton for franchise-record 11th straight loss
articles.description: Winnipeg led 3-1 after the first period but managed just five shots on goal in the final 40 minutes as Edmonton rallied for the win.

articles.title: Brazil’s President Lula vetoes bill to trim Bolsonaro prison sentence
articles.description: The opposition-controlled Congress voted in December to pass a bill that would reduce Bolsonaro's 27-year sentence.

articles.title: Player grades: Edmonton Oilers overcome iffy start to storm by Winnipeg Jets 4-3
articles.description: The Edmonton Oilers overcame an iffy first period abnd some iffy goaltending, but charged back from a two-goal deficit to beat the Winnipeg Jets 4-3. articles.title: Texier’s hat trick lifts Canadiens over Panthers 6-2; Montreal wins third straight
articles.description: Alexandre Texier’s hat trick led the Montreal Canadiens to a 6-2 win over the Florida Panthers on Thursday in front of a raucous Bell Centre crowd. articles.description: Easton Cowan scored 2:48 into a wild overtime and Scott Laughton had a short-handed goal in his return to Philadelphia as the Toronto Maple Leafs defeated the Flyers 2-1 on Thursday night. articles.title: Call of the Wilde: Montreal Canadiens drub Panthers 6-2 on another magical night
articles.description: The Canadiens have beaten the Florida Panthers five times, including a 3-2 win over the Christmas holiday. They continued their dominance on Thursday. Brian Wilde has more.
